reviewText:
I must really like this album since I have the CD, the Laser Video version and now have just purchased the DVD.
This is a fantastic album. Period!  What else is there to say?
Buy it.
Absolutely great !  The music is riveting and the videos are very imaginative, and imbued with such a nice spirit of racial equality and tolerance, coming from the South.
Fairly rare and hard to find. Reasonable price with quick shipping. Great purchase.
Great film transfer. Arrived super fast!
I don't like what was said when it was.how can we listen whaen it was.get up. I could

This DVD is a treasure and is a must have. Why? 3 simple things:

Losing My Religion
Mike Mills sings 2 songs
Peter's mandolin playing

Don't get me wrong, this is an A++ collection, but those are my 3 favorite things about it.

Just wish there was some bonus footage, but I'm happy to replace my VHS version of this with the DVD.
Haven't watched it yet as I got it for a present for my brother's 40th which is in July but I'm sure it will be good.  GO R.E.M.

didnt even know this existed. ive been listening to the cd out of time since hyapatia lee turned me on to them. one of my favorite albums, now the dvd is one i play over and over. especially near wild heaven. Mike Mills vocals on that song is great. and the video is as well. buy it if u like out of time

These are some of my favourite R.E.M. videos!
I was saddened by the terrible production quality on the DVD, however.  There is extreme artifacting and poor colour through out.  I will put-off purchasing other videos until they re-master this series.
